interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly, Top Japanese Makeup Remover, Gentle Skin Cleanser, Mild Floral Fragrance, Non-Greasy, 7.8 Ounce
Review Date: 2020/04/13
Store: Bioré
Product Description: ['Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is a non-greasy makeup remover that removes dirt and impurities from deep below the surface of your skin. This top Japanese makeup remover glides on gently and leaves no sticky residue. Formulated with conditioning beauty essence, this jelly leaves skin feeling moisturized and free of makeup. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.']
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '1.56 x 2.5 x 7.25 inches; 10.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28077_obs', 'UPC': '019100264557', 'Manufacturer': 'Kao USA Inc.'}
Review Text: The wipes come in a sealed like regular wipes package that goes inside little plastic container with a lid. The wipes have pleasant scent, remove make up really well from eye shadow to mist water that is pretty thick. It leaves skin clean and moisturized. I like using them. The size is enough to remove a good chunk of make up at one time.
Review Title: Good make up remover wipes
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
C.O. Bigelow Shampoo, Lavender Peppermint Shampoo Cleanses & Soothes Hair & Scalp, Luxury Shampoo for Men & Women, 10.4 Fl Oz.
C. O. Bigelow
{'Brand': 'C. O. Bigelow', 'Item Form': 'Lotion,Liquid,Gel', 'Scent': 'Fresh,Lavender,Peppermint', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Package Dimensions': '5.91 x 2.32 x 2.24 inches; 10.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '815691009023'}
This is a very good shampoo for everyday use. It has wonderful scent that keeps hair smelling great long after the shower, gets hair clean and moisturizes scalp well. I like using it.
Love the scent
Lip MOISTURIZER by MERLOTSPF15 - Intense Therapy Lip Moisturizer - Grape Seed Infused - for Healing Dry, Chapped Lips. Made with Beeswax, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E - Color FreeSPF 15
Merlot
{'Package Dimensions': '2.71 x 1.57 x 0.59 inches; 0.32 Ounces'}
This chapstick is tasteless and has no smell. Unlike many others, when applied it does not leave lips feeling greasy - it starts working right away. Lips are moist, supple, and it stays on for long periods of time. I like it. I have a bad habit of peeling my lips, and when this chapstick is on, I do not have the urge to do it.
Good chapstick

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: The user continues to favor high-quality personal care products, now extending their interest to makeup removers that effectively cleanse while moisturizing the skin. This aligns with their broader approach to multifunctional personal care.
- **Scent Preference**: While the user prioritizes fresh and soothing scents, their recent experience with a mild floral fragrance indicates a growing acceptance of gentle scents that enhance product functionality without compromising their sensitivities.
- **Usage Habits**: The user values effective daily use products, with a strong inclination towards those that leave skin feeling clean and moisturized. They appreciate items that integrate seamlessly into their routine, highlighting their preference for non-greasy formulations.
- **Quality Expectations**: They maintain high standards for product effectiveness, as reflected by their 5-star ratings for multiple items, demonstrating satisfaction with formulations that deliver on their promises.
- **Material Concerns**: The user is still drawn to safe, naturally derived ingredients, with a focus on avoiding irritants and additives, ensuring their choices align with their health-conscious values.
- **Gender Neutral**: Their preferences remain unaffected by gender-specific marketing, as they prioritize quality and effectiveness over product categorization.

Overall, the user exhibits a consistent trend towards high-performance, multifunctional personal care products that enhance their daily routine while ensuring comfort and effectiveness.
